name: Legend of Cube
description:
Welcome to Legend Of Cube!
Manouver the protagonist - Cube - through levels with deadly obstacles by changing his module and using a limited amount of skills by consuming CubeRrency.
CONTROLS

MOVE: A-D / Left-Right-Arrows

MODULES:

1: Activate Wing Module /  Jump

2: Activate Boots Module / Sprint

3: Activate Pew Pew Module / Shoot

4: Activate Growth Module / Grow
